thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: SARANAC

author: SARANAC
title: SARANAC
text: I spoke to them via email, chat, and over the phone everyone was courteous and amazing customer service I even took the time to make sure the people I spoke with were noticed for being great on the phone. I would recommend them to anyone and everyone. It doesn't hurt to shop around they do some price matching. Most of all they are honest and if an answer is unknown they will find and make sure it is delivered to you within a timely manner, a refreshing experience
